content:
The revolutionary movement is celebrated, allies, and international friends are the 85th universal Jose Maria Sison in February 8. They launched various activities to honor Ka Joma and recognize his important contributions to Philippine revolution.

In Rizal, a series of Oplan-Paint and Oplan-painted in some of the provisions of the Province (KM) -Rizal on February 11. In the popular area of Barangay San Juan, Taytay, young people and the young "Wheat paste art" showing Ka Joma's image. They also painted the walls of the youth's call to adopt the new People's Army and participated in the people's war.

In Utrecht, the Netherlands, a cultural program launched a cultural program at the National Democratic Front of the Philippines (NDFP).
title: PRWC »Ka Joma's 85th birthday, celebrated
